name: Specular Splotch
description:
You are controlling a blob through  puzzles to get him some food.
Some levels require you to change the theme of the game to show bridges or hide
barriers. Can you collect all fruits?

Puzzles include changing gravity, changing walls and hopefully a lot of fun.

Leave a comment if you wish an update with more levels and a "turn off music" button.
In future updates there may be an level-editor and custom level support.
